attributes.action: get private medical treatment in place for the British Armed Forces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
PRIVATE MEDICAL CARE FOR OUR ARMED FORCES
It is disgusting that the Armed Forces troops who have served for our country abroad are waiting 18 months for operations, and a minimum of 24 months for mental health care.  None of us can imagine what our men must see out there and they are fighting for US so why aren't we doing more to help them?  We feel it is disgusting that these time scales exist and believe that they should be fast tracked or given private medical care as part of the 'joining the forces package'.  If we can't even give our troops private medical care for fighting for our country, then what has this country come to?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
